justification: Understands B needs win-now help and a safe QB, but barely engages B’s contrarian, established-talent preference or TE depth. Considers both sides but shallowly. The trade is feasible and helps B’s QB/WR depth, while A upgrades a healthy TE, yet A likely overpays and loses a healthy Tier 2 QB despite being injury-cautious. Rationale is generic and light on roster/tier specifics.
